overview: We're seeking an enthusiastic and innovative Product Manager to bring to market the integration of Data and Generative AI into our products and processes.
description: We're looking for a Senior Product Manager to lead the ideation, development, and launch of new products and services that leverage Data and GenAI to transform our creative process. The role involves owning the new products and services from concept to deployment to post-launch reporting and iterations. The ideal candidate should have 3-5 years of product management experience, preferably in the martech and/or creative tech sectors. They should also have a deep understanding of marketing use cases and experience using a range of martech/adtech tools. Strong leadership skills and exceptional communication skills are essential. The role requires a relentless focus on user experience and the ability to translate customer needs into product features. Familiarity with project management tools such as JIRA, Notion, Asana, and design tools like Figma is preferred. The salary range for this position is not specified.
requirements: 3-5 years in product management with a history of developing innovative products, preferably in the martech and/or creative tech sectors
Proven experience taking new products to market incl. driving GTM activities and shipping the whole experience end-to-end
Deep understanding of marketing use cases and experience using a range of martech/adtech tools, preferably with hands-on marketing experience
Demonstrated ability to formulate a product vision that marries innovation with growth. Strong leadership skills with a proven track record of driving cross-functional teams to meet your goals
Substantial experience owning key product execution tasks including conducting analysis using multiple sources, extracting insights, interviewing users, and writing out product specifications
Exceptional communication skills with the ability to convey complex product features and growth strategies to a varied audience
A relentless focus on user experience and a strong ability to translate customer needs into product features
Familiarity with Project Management tools such as JIRA, Notion, Asana, and design tools like Figma
A growth mindset and the ability to adapt in a rapidly changing environment
Experience with product-led-growth in B2B Saas is a plus
